<h3>Raccoon Miner (Beta)</h3>

With Raccoon Miner you can easily mine crypto with your PC when you are not playing games.<br>
It combines different miners and make it easy to use mining pools.

<br>
<br>

Features:<br>
• Ethereum and Monero (more currencies coming soon)<br>
• Configurable mining pools<br>
• Configurable CPUs and GPUs<br>
• Automatic suspend mode when in game<br>
• Overview of Hash Rate and pool balance<br>

<br>
Raccoon Miner is in development. Please use the feedback form to send us feature requests and bug reports.
